text: aur yadi tum apanee patniyon ke beech nyaay karana chaaho, to bhee aisa kadaapi nahin kar[1] sakoge. atah ek hee kee or poornatah jhuk[2] na jao aur (shesh ko) beech mein latakee huee na chhod do aur yadi (apane vyavahaar mein) sudhaar[3] rakho aur (allaah se) darate raho, to nihsandeh allaah ati kshamaasheel dayaavan hai
